mapper.select: SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, P.PR_PRORATE, (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(P.PR_ENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) PR_ENDDATE FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.GR_ID = #{gr_id} AND GP.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND NOT P.PR_CONDITION = 'C'

SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, P.PR_PRORATE, (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(P.PR_ENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) PR_ENDDATE FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND NOT P.PR_CONDITION = 'C'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RC_PROJECT (PR_ID, PR_NAME, PR_STARTDATE, PR_ENDDATE, PR_GOAL, PR_ETC) VALUES (#{pr_id}, #{pr_name}, TO_DATE(#{pr_startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{pr_enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{pr_goal}, #{pr_etc})
INSERT INTO RC_PROMEM (PR_ID, MEM_ID, PR_LEVEL) VALUES (#{pr_id}, #{mem_id}, 'PM')

INSERT INTO RC_PROJECT (PR_ID, PR_NAME, PR_STARTDATE, PR_ENDDATE, PR_GOAL, PR_ETC) VALUES (#{pr_id}, #{pr_name}, TO_DATE(#{pr_startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{pr_enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{pr_goal}, #{pr_etc})
INSERT INTO RC_PROMEM (PR_ID, MEM_ID, PR_LEVEL) VALUES (#{pr_id}, #{mem_id}, 'PM')
mapper.select: SELECT P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME, P.PR_MEMCNT, P.PR_GOAL, TO_CHAR(P.PR_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PR_STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(P.PR_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PR_ENDDATE, P.PR_ETC, P.PR_SEARCHYN, P.PR_CONDITION, P.PR_PRORATE FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM')
SELECT M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_ID IN (SELECT P.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM P WHERE P.PR_ID = #{pr_id})
SELECT PM.PR_LEVEL FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}

SELECT M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_MEMBER M WHERE NOT M.MEM_ID IN (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = #{pr_id}) AND M.MEM_ID IN (SELECT GM.MEM_ID FROM RC_GROUPMEM GM WHERE GM.GR_ID = #{gr_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_MEMCNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}) WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND PR_LEVEL = 'PIM'
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_PROMEM SET PR_LEVEL = 'PM' WHERE MEM_ID = #{new_id} AND PR_ID = #{pr_id}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, P.PR_CONDITION FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.GR_ID = #{gr_id}) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})
SELECT WK_ID FROM RC_WORKLIST WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND WK_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT GATT_PATH, GATT_RNAME FROM RC_GNPATTACH WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_WORKCOMMENT SET WCOM_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id}
UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id}
UPDATE RC_WORKLIST SET WK_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}
UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_MEMCNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}) WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}
UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}
mapper.select: SELECT WK_PRORATE FROM RC_WORKLIST WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_PRORATE = #{pr_proRate} WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id}

UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_CONDITION = 'I' WHERE PR_ID IN (SELECT P.PR_ID FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.GR_ID = #{gr_id} AND GP.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N') AND (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(PR_STARTDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) < 0

UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_CONDITION = 'C' WHERE PR_ID IN (SELECT P.PR_ID FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.GR_ID = #{gr_id} AND GP.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N') AND (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(PR_ENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) < 0

UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_CONDITION = 'I' WHERE PR_ID IN (SELECT P.PR_ID FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N') AND (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(PR_STARTDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) < 0

UPDATE RC_PROJECT SET PR_CONDITION = 'C' WHERE PR_ID IN (SELECT P.PR_ID FROM RC_PROJECT P WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N') AND (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(PR_ENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) < 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DOINGPRO FROM RC_PROJECT WHERE PR_CONDITION = 'I' AND PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TODOPRO FROM RC_PROJECT WHERE PR_CONDITION = 'T' AND PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DONEPRO FROM RC_PROJECT WHERE PR_CONDITION = 'C' AND PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( SELECT G.GR_NAME, P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'C' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY P.PR_REGDATE DESC ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'C' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM' AND PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_CONDITION = 'C'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( SELECT G.GR_NAME, P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'I' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY P.PR_REGDATE DESC ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'I' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM' AND PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_CONDITION = 'I'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( SELECT G.GR_NAME, P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'T' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY P.PR_REGDATE DESC ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = 'T' AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME, P.PR_CONDITION FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM' AND PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_CONDITION = 'T' AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME, P.PR_CONDITION, CASE WHEN (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) IS NOT NULL THEN '그룹' ELSE '개인' END AS GRYN FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_SEARCHYN = 'A' AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_NAME LIKE '%${pr_name}%' ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_SEARCHYN = 'A' AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_NAME LIKE '%${pr_name}%'

SELECT G.GR_NAME, P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_GROUP G, RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE P.PR_CONDITION = #{pr_condition} AND G.GR_ID = (SELECT GP.GR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP WHERE GP.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM') AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_NAME LIKE '%${pr_name}%'

SELECT P.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, M.MEM_NAME FROM RC_PROJECT P, RC_MEMBER M WHERE NOT P.PR_ID IN (SELECT GP.PR_ID FROM RC_GRPRO GP) AND M.MEM_ID = (SELECT PM.MEM_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM' AND PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID) AND P.PR_ID IN (SELECT PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}) AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N' AND P.PR_CONDITION = #{pr_condition} AND P.PR_NAME LIKE '%${pr_name}%'
